item.title: From teenage Arsenal prodigy to convicted drug smuggler
item.description: As a young player, Jay Emmanuel-Thomas had the world at his feet. Where did it all go wrong?

item.title: North Korea makes arrests over botched ship launch
item.description: Kim Jong Un said those who made "irresponsible errors" would be dealt with at a plenary meeting next month.

item.title: King's invite to Canada sends a message to Trump - and the world
item.description: Canada once downplayed the monarchy. Now, it is leaning on it to assert its sovereignty.

item.title: Someone stole my BBC broadcasting bike - it's like losing a friend
item.description: Anna Holligan transformed her bike into a mobile studio for the BBC in Amsterdam - now it has vanished.

item.title: 'It's not fair': Other refugees in limbo as US welcomes white South Africans
item.description: Refugees from other nations ask why the White House has made an exception for white South Africans.
